m_szDocSumamry: iTelematics Software Private Limited iTelematics For the new generation of smart users who would like to make their life simpler, iTelematics is a Secure Browser for the Internet Of Things, that helps you control and keep track of information about your Phone and other connected devices. Unlike other IoT apps, our product communicates securely between cross platform vehicles, homes and connected devices.
